name: Warfighter - .50 Cal Field Maduro - RobustoÂ
additionalNotes: Created in mind for those who have served in the U.S. military (or simply those who wish to pay tribute to said heroes), the Warfighter Tobacco Company is owned and operated by combat veterans looking to give even more to their community. Originally based out of the Dominican Republic, Warfighter has now recently set up base at Plasencia's factory in Esteli, Nicaragua in order to "turn this thing up to 11", according to co-founder Chris Ferdico. Available with a maduro wrapper, the Warfighter .50 Cal Field boasts a rich and toasty full-body profile full of leather, earth and raisin for a bold and spicy smoke.
